« 3:10 » Doncaster

FRI 5 MAR 2010

E B F sportingbet.com Mares´ "National Hunt" Novices´ Hurdle (Qualifier) (CLASS 4) (4yo+) Winner £3,578ATR
Good 2m3f110y Number of runners: 8

SHOW:
Choose comment type:
Racing Post Poker
Sign up to play now
Card & form print-outs
Print this race card
Cards help

£5,500 guaranteed For 4yo+, which are E.B.F. eligible and which have not run in a Flat race. horses which have won more than three hurdles or have won two previous E.B.F. Mares' Novices' Hurdle Race Qualifiers are notqualified to run Weights 4yo.10st 3lb; 5yo+ 10st 12lb Penalties each hurdle won 7lb Entries 23 pay £ 25 Penalty value 1st £3,577.75 2nd £1,050.50 3rd £525.25 4th £262.35
